game.name: Caribbean Legend: Age of Pirates
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 당신은 자신의 배를 지휘하는 선장 — 17세기 카리브해 최고의 운명. 무제한 샌드박스 경험. 해전, 육상 탐험, 글로벌 맵을 결합한 독특한 장르. Sid Meier's Pirates!와 Bannerlord의 만남.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are the captain and owner of your own ship—the finest fate one could hope for in the 17th century Caribbean. Unlimited sandbox experience. A unique genre blending naval combat, land exploration, and global map. Think Sid Meier's Pirates! meets Bannerlord.
